issue.title: [Rust] Implement common Reader / DataSource trait for CSV and Parquet
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4092](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4092). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As a developer, I would like to be able to execute queries against Arrow data sources using a common trait.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4092?focusedCommentId=16788765) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
This was done some time ago.
